actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that loan guarantees in certain programs shall be limited only by the availability of qualified applicants and limitations in appropriation Acts.

summary.text: Amends various Federal laws to require that loan guarantees in certain programs pursuant to such Acts be subject only to: (1) the availability of qualified applicants; and (2) limitations contained in appropriation Acts.

titles.title: A bill to provide that loan guarantees in certain programs shall be limited only by the availability of qualified applicants and limitations in appropriation Acts.
